 Pantron watched as the ship landed. He walked aboard and prepared to meet phobia cyberwolf4@... wrote: 
Phobias eyes lit up after hearing what Pantron had just told him. He 
doubted the information about the key, but the mention of the Ark 
confirmed his suspicions. He was on Earth, the damn planet that got 
the origional Megatron killed. (transformers the Movie Megatron was 
wounded in the Earth battle, and later thrown into space by 
Starscream.) Phobia knew of the great war , not being programmed as a 
historian, he never bothered to download all the datatracks.

Phobia almost admired Pantron. Pantron was unarmed and defenseless, 
saying all the right things to stay alive. He could tell a survivor 
when he saw one, and right now Pantron was despeate enough to side 
with Phobia to stay that way.

"Computer, set all controls to my voice, lock on to my vitals. If my 
vitals drop, land on top of the nearest translifeform and detonate."

Phobia didn't trust anyone except himself, and even that was a thin 
trust.

"I'm landing Pantron prepare to come aboard."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, ddsg sdgfd <earth2025abc@y...> wrote:
> 
>  
> 
> Pantron was already in beast mode. He took out his weapons and 
disarmed them. He was takeing a very large chance here. The bot could 
destroy him at any time. " I have information you want. I have been 
around for a long time. I was around when Rodimus Prime was crowned. 
You need me but I need you more. Also I have a key to the ark. It 
will give us the power to fly it if we ever get a hold of the ark. It 
was given to me by a friend. He stole it when he helped megatron 
steal the golden discs. Please let us talk."Pantron heard the 
rumbling of engines above him. He turned to see 
> Phobias ship lowering itself towards the ground.
> 
> Phobia wasn,t sure if the other Predicons had gotten his message, 
he 
> figured Pantron had information that the Predicon army would want. 
If 
> they weren't interested then he certainly was. In war it isn't who 
> has the most firepower, it was who has the most detailed 
information.
> 
> The ooutside intercom opened, and with a booming resonance Phobias 
> voice came alive. "Pantron, transform to your beast mode (If he 
> already isn't) and step forward. You are being scanned, disarm your 
> weapons and we'll talk. Until then I will consider you as big a 
> threat as Magmatron. I think you know what I'd do to him in this 
> situation, don't you." Phobia knew either way he held an unbeatable 
> hand.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, ddsg sdgfd <earth2025abc@y...> wrote:
> > 
> >  
> > Pantron got the message from phobia. He locked on to the 
> coordinates and took his leave. He took the order not to use his 
> comm. He arrived at the coordinates unsure weither Phbia would be 
> waiting for him.
> >   cyberwolf4@p... wrote: 
> > Phobia knew about Pantron, he'd heard enough to know that neither 
> one 
> > of them could step anywhere within 100 miles of Magmatrons base 
> > without a eulogy handy. Phobia had deceived and swindled the 
> > Destrucon leader and he knew one day he'd have slag to pay. 
Unless 
> he 
> > had a scape goat, or at least a scape panther to take the blow 
for 
> > him. On this planet he needed all the shields he could find.
> > 
> > Phobia to Pantor, if you're familiar with the Destrucon map of 
this 
> > planet meet me at coordinates 9211-8 (What will one day be 
southern 
> > Japan.) If youcan arrange transportation. Keep radio silence from 
> > here on out.
> > 
> > After broadcasting the message to Pantor, he set communications 
to 
> a 
> > group of Predicons he'd detected near the Arks location. With the 
> > press of a button he repeated the comunication to them.
> > 
> > (Megatron, Hellbeast, this means you.)
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, ddsg sdgfd <earth2025abc@y...> wrote:
> > > Pohbia i wish to join you. This is Pantron. Pleae
> > > accept for i have no other place to go
> > > --- cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > Phobia set his position on the moon, and coagulated
> > > > what limited 
> > > > information he'd "Borrowed" from Magmatrons
> > > > computers, with his 
> > > > origional scans. Now that he'd added some
> > > > cybertronian technology 
> > > > with his systems there was a good chance that he
> > > > wouldn't be blown 
> > > > out of the sky if he approached a predicon outpost.
> > > > 
> > > > His scans showed a 96% probability of Predicon
> > > > locations. 
> > > > 
> > > > His babies that he left behind conyinued to relay
> > > > information to him 
> > > > on a regular basis so he knew that Magmatrons guests
> > > > turned down his 
> > > > invatation. That would mean that Magmatron would be
> > > > really pissed off 
> > > > when he realized Phobia didn't plan on returning.
> > > > 
> > > > He continues scanning the planet to find active
> > > > Predicon signatures.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz"
> > > > <wilddance_mare@h...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Cyber Claw:
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > Cyber Claw grinned at Hell Beast. Sub-commander
> > > > material. She had 
> > > > never 
> > > > > heard that before. All that her old commander told
> > > > her she was was 
> > > > a 
> > > > > worthless slag. She was proud someone thought
> > > > differently.
> > > > > 
> > > > > She nodded to him in response to his coordinates
> > > > and left.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > >From: JP3884@a...
> > > > > >Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > > > > >To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
> > > > > >Subject: Re: Inflitrating the pred base
> > > > > >Date: Fri, 30 Jun 2000 16:19:36 EDT
> > > > > >
> > > > > >::: Hell Beast glared at Cyber Claw ::: Very
> > > > well. I like your 
> > > > spunk, if 
> > > > > >you
> > > > > >were on my team, you would be Sub-commander
> > > > material. Definetly. 
> > > > Well, here
> > > > > >are the coordinates. Megatron is back on his old
> > > > turff, the Omega 
> > > > sector,
> > > > > >2.998.7. Its at the base of a large mountian.
> > > > > >
> > > > > >~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > > > >
> > > > > >::: Megatron, litening to Kitkats proposal
> > > > smiled. ::: Of course 
> > > > we would
> > > > > >love to have you on the team...

> > > > > >::: With his Tailgun covering his right arm, he
> > > > dug it into 
> > > > Kitkats ribs 
> > > > > >and
> > > > > >send a bolt of energy through it :::
> > > > > >
> > > > > >::: Megatron ::: Just NEVER EVER raise your voice
> > > > to me agian! Now 
> > > > get into
> > > > > >the CR chambers and get your head on strait.
> > > > Besides that, your 
> > > > more than
> > > > > >welcome to join me.
